title: CDC to stop tracking Covid levels in communities
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is planning to stop tracking the spread of Covid in communities across the U.S., the agency said Friday.

title: What to know about Bluesky, the Twitter alternative that some celebrities and journalists are joining
description: Why some major politicians and celebrities are turning away from Elon Musk-owned Twitter and toward Bluesky, a social platform started by Jack Dorsey.

title: Lesbian dating platform sends a 'message to transphobes': Delete our app
description: A popular lesbian dating app has one message for users who don’t want transgender people on the platform: “Don’t let the door hit you on the way out.”

title: A Montana lawmaker suggested she'd rather risk her child's suicide than let her transition
description: State Rep. Kerri Seekins-Crowe recently suggested during a floor debate that she'd rather risk her daughter dying by suicide than allow her to transition.

title: Person of interest in custody after Detroit neurosurgeon is found dead in his home from multiple gunshots
description: Detroit police have a person of interest in custody following the death of a highly beloved neurosurgeon, whose body was discovered Sunday in his home.

title: 'I think he's in trouble': Growing number of Ron DeSantis donors and allies hope for a shake-up
description: As Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis prepares to jump into the presidential race, a growing number of supporters say he is sorely in need of a change in strategy.

title: A Montana lawmaker suggested she’d rather risk her child’s suicide than let her transition
description: State Rep. Kerri Seekins-Crowe recently suggested during a floor debate that she'd rather risk her daughter dying by suicide than allow her to transition.

title: Donald Trump embraces Jan. 6 defendant who wants Mike Pence executed
description: Former President Donald Trump embraced a Jan. 6 defendant and QAnon supporter, Micki Larson-Olson, who has called for Mike Pence's execution.

title: 'Mom influencer' found guilty of lying about Latino couple trying to kidnap her kids at California store
description: A white California "mom influencer" was convicted of fabricating a story about a Latino couple trying to kidnap her children at a Michaels.

title: Illinois man fatally shot by neighbor while using leaf blower in his own yard, officials say
description: An Illinois man using a leaf blower in his own yard was fatally shot allegedly by his 79-year-old neighbor during an argument, marking the latest incident in which people are gunned down while going about their everyday lives.

title: Democratic senator introduces bill targeting AI's shortfalls
description: Sen. Michael Bennet introduced a bill on Thursday that would create a task force to look at U.S. policies on artificial intelligence.

title: Schumer demands Texas judge make changes to prevent 'forum shopping'
description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer is calling on a chief judge in a Texas federal court to change case assignment practices in order to prevent "forum shopping."

title: The communication breakdown between the U.S. and China raises the risk of an unintended crisis
description: A breakdown in communication between the U.S. and China is raising the risk of an unintended crisis or conflict, current and ex U.S. and Western officials say.

title: Top Republican convinced Trump can help take back the Senate: 'He wants to win'
description: Sen. Steve Daines, R-Mont., is the man in charge of retaking the Senate for Republicans in 2024. And he thinks he has a secret weapon: former President Donald Trump.

title: BBC chief quits amid scandal over role in Boris Johnson loan
description: The chairman of the BBC quit Friday after a report found he failed to disclose a potential conflict of interest over his role in arranging a 2021 loan for Boris Johnson, who was the U.K.’s prime minister at the time.

title: James Corden addresses divided America in final ‘Late Late Show’
description: James Corden used part of his farewell speech on Thursday’s final episode of CBS’ “ The Late Late Show” to address the deep rift in America over hot button issues including politics and ideology.

title: 3 soldiers dead after Army attack helicopters collide and crash in Alaska
description: Three soldiers were killed and a fourth was injured after the Army Apache helicopters they were in collided in mid-air and crashed in Alaska on Thursday, the military said.

title: South Carolina Senate again rejects near-total abortion ban as five women filibuster
description: The bill would've banned nearly all abortions in a state that has increasingly served patients across a region where Republicans have otherwise curtailed access.
